markdownRemark.html: This language school, located close to the beach in Malaga, delivers Spanish courses for foreigners. The school forms part of the Sprachcaffe schools, a network of schools dedicated to the teaching of Languages ​​for foreigners with more than 30 schools around the world. They also offer additional options for learning other languages like English and German. They also offer different types of accommodation in Malaga, courses with different schedules, extracurricular activities and a tutoring service that will make the most of your trip.
